text:
e="preserve">DIGIS is a European software development company, established in 2009 with main office in Larnaca, Cyprus.
History.
In 2009, Alpha Crew sailor staffing agency based in Odesa established an IT department to develop an internal CRM system. A year later, a representative office was opened in the UK.
In 2015, IT department grew into a separate company Do IT Programming Solutions with an office in Odesa.
In 2018, the company made a rebranding and changed its name to DIGIS. New office was opened in Cyprus and headquarters were moved to Larnaca.
Also,  DIGIS created an annual scholarship program to draw the attention of American youth to software engineering and IT.
Among DIGIS clients are such companies as PwC, Energias de Portugal, BlaBlaCar, and Roomster.
